targets.rawSql:
-- 1) DML de add/edit/delete (pode manter igual ao que você já tem)
DO $$
BEGIN
  IF '${action}' = 'delete' AND NULLIF('${rule_id}','') IS NOT NULL THEN
    DELETE FROM dinasore.rules
    WHERE rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer;
  END IF;

  IF '${action}' = 'edit' AND NULLIF('${rule_id}','') IS NOT NULL THEN
    -- se normal/anomaly
    IF (SELECT rule_value 
         FROM dinasore.rules 
         WHERE rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer
       ) LIKE '%normal_mean=%'
    THEN
      UPDATE dinasore.rules
      SET
        rule_value    =   
          'normal_mean='  || '${normal_mean}'  ||
          ';normal_std='  || '${normal_std}'  ||
          ';anomaly_mean='|| '${anomaly_mean}'||
          ';anomaly_std=' || '${anomaly_std}',
        rule_priority = NULLIF('${rule_priority}','')::integer
      WHERE rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer;

    ELSE
      -- activation condition
      UPDATE dinasore.rules
      SET
        rule_value    = 'activate_on_' || '${activation_condition}',
        rule_priority = NULLIF('${rule_priority}','')::integer
      WHERE rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer;
    END IF;
  END IF;

  IF '${action}' = 'add' THEN
    IF '${normal_mean}' != '' AND '${normal_std}' != ''
       AND '${anomaly_mean}' != '' AND '${anomaly_std}' != ''
    THEN
      INSERT INTO dinasore.rules(rule_value, rule_priority)
      VALUES(
        'normal_mean='  || '${normal_mean}'  ||
        ';normal_std='  || '${normal_std}'  ||
        ';anomaly_mean='|| '${anomaly_mean}'||
        ';anomaly_std=' || '${anomaly_std}',
        NULLIF('${rule_priority}','')::integer
      );
    ELSIF '${activation_condition}' != '' THEN
      INSERT INTO dinasore.rules(rule_value, rule_priority)
      VALUES(
        'activate_on_'||'${activation_condition}',
        NULLIF('${rule_priority}','')::integer
      );
    END IF;
  END IF;
END;
$$;

-- 2) Query principal só de leitura
WITH parsed AS (
  SELECT
    r.rule_id,
    r.rule_priority,
    substring(r.rule_value FROM 'normal_mean=([^;]*)')     AS normal_mean,
    substring(r.rule_value FROM 'normal_std=([^;]*)')      AS normal_std,
    substring(r.rule_value FROM 'anomaly_mean=([^;]*)')    AS anomaly_mean,
    substring(r.rule_value FROM 'anomaly_std=([^;]*)')     AS anomaly_std,
    substring(r.rule_value FROM 'activate_on_(.*)')        AS activation_condition
  FROM dinasore.rules r
)

SELECT
  -- em ADD, mostramos linha em branco; senão, o id real
  CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'
       THEN NULL
       ELSE p.rule_id
  END                           AS rule_id,

  -- regra de prioridade: use a do form em add/edit, ou a do banco em view
  COALESCE(
    NULLIF('${rule_priority}','')::integer,
    p.rule_priority
  )                              AS rule_priority,

  -- mesmas táticas para cada campo
  COALESCE(
    CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'  THEN '${normal_mean}'
         WHEN '${action}' = 'edit' 
              AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer 
         THEN '${normal_mean}'
    END,
    p.normal_mean
  )                              AS normal_mean,

  COALESCE(
    CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'  THEN '${normal_std}'
         WHEN '${action}' = 'edit' 
              AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer 
         THEN '${normal_std}'
    END,
    p.normal_std
  )                              AS normal_std,

  COALESCE(
    CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'  THEN '${anomaly_mean}'
         WHEN '${action}' = 'edit' 
              AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer 
         THEN '${anomaly_mean}'
    END,
    p.anomaly_mean
  )                              AS anomaly_mean,

  COALESCE(
    CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'  THEN '${anomaly_std}'
         WHEN '${action}' = 'edit' 
              AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer 
         THEN '${anomaly_std}'
    END,
    p.anomaly_std
  )                              AS anomaly_std,

  COALESCE(
    CASE WHEN '${action}' = 'add'  THEN '${activation_condition}'
         WHEN '${action}' = 'edit' 
              AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer 
         THEN '${activation_condition}'
    END,
    p.activation_condition
  )                              AS activation_condition

FROM parsed p
WHERE
    -- SEMPRE traz todas em VIEW
    '${action}' = 'view'
    -- ADD também não filtra
 OR '${action}' = 'add'
    -- só filtra quando edit/delete e rule_id for preenchido
 OR (
      '${action}' IN ('edit','delete')
      AND p.rule_id = NULLIF('${rule_id}','')::integer
    )
ORDER BY p.rule_id;
